Header.title: The solution for your home
Header.paragraph: Need a helping hand? Eco-Home services is here for you!

About.paragraph: We are ECO-HOME SERVICES, a mutli-service company run by a skilled team who understands the right way to offer home services. We created Eco-Home to make people's lives easier by offering services for all your needs under one name!

Services.name: Landscaping
Services.text: Complete landscaping solutions including sod installation, interlocking, garden design, cleanup, and seasonal yard care—done with precision and reliability.

Services.name: Handyman Services
Services.text: Fast, dependable handyman help for repairs, installations, furniture assembly, and general home maintenance. No job too big or too small.

Services.name: Moving Assistance
Services.text: Stress-free moving support—packing, loading, transport, and unloading. We handle the heavy lifting so your move is smooth and efficient.

Services.name: Garden Maintenance
Services.text: Keep your garden healthy and beautiful with routine weeding, trimming, fertilizing, soil care, and seasonal preparation.

Services.name: Power Washing
Services.text: Restore your property's exterior with high-pressure cleaning for driveways, decks, siding, patios, walkways, and more.

Services.name: Snow Removal
Services.text: Reliable winter snow clearing for driveways, walkways, entrances, and small commercial areas—available throughout the season.

Services.name: Home Projects
Services.text: From painting to interior updates, we help you refresh, repair, and improve your home with efficient, high-quality workmanship.

Services.name: Home Maintenance
Services.text: General maintenance services to keep your property running smoothly—seasonal tasks, small fixes, and ongoing care.

Services.name: Outdoor Services
Services.text: Professional outdoor care including landscaping, garden cleanup, hedge trimming, and seasonal yard preparation.
